description.value:
You gain two of the following powers of your choice.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.vYX916UsNHI2FL0c]{Battle Wrath}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.RI3dzogQjNwyk6r1]{Cleaving Assault}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.96zQdSRkuTwIEM8Z]{Defend the Line}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.fHg4K5hB3lqy7Ar0]{Glimmering Blade}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.Q4JukdiHxIspRtXq]{Hammer Hands}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.EXAeLNzbCJxVB2jK]{Measured Cut}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.zhGqNBSDgjY79pJ2]{Poised Assault}
